response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us and has the potential to significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. After careful consideration of its worth and the impact it could have on your business, we are offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a fantastic opportunity to acquire a high-quality asset at a competitive rate, ensuring both value and efficiency. We believe this investment would be highly beneficial for you, aligning with your goals and objectives. Please let us know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this exclusive offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
